Titles.jpn: ギルティホール～教え子しか指名できない店～

Summaries.eng:
This overworked and underpaid teacher, Mr. Sasaki, has his whole life turned upside down when he stumbles upon the "Guilty Hole." He thinks it's a dream when he sees the student's shoe lockers have been transformed into selection panels... seeing one that catches his eye, he joking picks her...

When she appears in his classroom in the middle of the night, throwing insults at him, but her eyes seem to linger on him, tinged with embarassment.
Summaries.jpn: Allowed content, see tickets #TVDB-543045 & ﻿#TVDB-462601 + Source: https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2024-10-04/kentie-room-of-guilty-pleasure-manga-gets-animefesta-anime/.216352 + https://www.thetvdb.com/lists/custom?_token=H3gF0u0C2fnh6jt1xw5rsGMmZWT1oIGjadGJa8Co&string=Animefesta Source: https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=32920

Aliases: Guilty Hole: Oshiego Shika Shimei Dekinai Mise

Titles.eng: Welcome to the Room of Guilty Pleasure

Summaries.eng: Mamoru Sasaki, a teacher who works overtime and gets dissed by his students, hears a mysterious announcement in school at midnight. The voice welcomes him to the Room of Guilty Pleasure, where he can pick any student he likes. Assuming that it's just a dream from the situation spread out before him, Sasaki picks one student on a whim. Led by the announcement, he enters a classroom where his sassy student, Mai Hoshino, is waiting for him, looking embarrassed...

Titles.eng: Would You Like to Request a Girl With Glasses?
Titles.jpn: メガネ女子をご指名ですか？

Summaries.eng: After finishing his supplementary classes, Sasaki Mamoru works overtime until late at night. He is dozing off when the bell rings and wakes up, only to find himself face to face with "Guilty Hole" once again. "Which girl would you like to go with today?" Sasaki asks nervously, but chooses Takajo Makoto, the class representative. In response to Sasaki's sincerity, Takajo says, "As a thank you for listening to my advice..." and begins to button her uniform.
Summaries.jpn:
補習授業を終え、夜まで残業をしている佐々木真守。
微睡んでいるところにチャイムが鳴り目を覚ますと『ギルティホール』と再び相まみえることになる。
「本日はどの子にしますか？」動揺しつつも、佐々木は、クラスの委員長である宝条真琴を指名する。
誠実な佐々木に対し宝条は「相談に乗ってもらったお礼に……」と、自ら制服のボタンに手をかける。

Titles.jpn: オプション解放おめでとうございます

Summaries.eng:
"Congratulations on unlocking the option! We have a reverse nomination today."
Sasaki Mamoru can't hide his confusion as a different message than usual comes on the air. Light spills out from his Guilty Hall membership card, and he is transported to the audiovisual room.
Waiting for him there is a beaming Hojo Makoto. The letters NN are written on the blackboard. This is a dream world. As his student Hojo stares at him, Sasaki, his homeroom teacher, can no longer contain himself...
Summaries.jpn:
「オプション開放おめでとうございます！　本日は逆指名が入っております」
いつもとは違う内容の放送が流れ、戸惑いを隠せない佐々木真守。
ギルティホールの会員証から光が溢れ、視聴覚室へと転移する。
そこで待っていたのは満面の笑みの宝条真琴だった。
黒板にはNNの文字。ここは夢の空間。
見つめてくる教え子の宝条に対し、担任である佐々木は我慢できなくなり……。
